name: Worms 2

files.setup: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Worms 2 installer executable

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Worms 2 installer executable
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Worms 2/frontend.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    key: VideoSetting
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Team17SoftwareLTD\frontend\Worms2
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: 5
- task:
    arch: win32
    exclude_processes: GOGLauncher.exe start.exe
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
